goal.title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

indicators.title: Proportion of population below national poverty line
Proportion of children living in poverty measured by multiple dimensions according to national definitions
Proportion of the poor and the vulnerable received social emergency relief services
Percentage of total members of registered community fisheries and forestry with tenure rights to fisheries and forestry resources management through effective community registration and development

goal.title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

indicators.title: Percent of children under 5 years old who are moderately or severely stunted
Percent of children under 5 years old who are moderately or severely wasted
Value of agricultural production per unit of labor engaged in agriculture (farming, animal husbandry and fisheries)
Sustainable Agricultural Land Productivity
Number of plant genetic resources for food and agriculture secured​ in policy, strategy and either medium or long-term conservation facilities
Percentage of households in community in protected area improving their livelihood through receiving the benefits from NTFPs, integrated agriculture, eco-tourism within the protect areas
Total Official flows (official development assistance + other official flows) to agriculture sector (as % of GDP)

goal.title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

indicators.title: Life expectancy at birth
Total fertility rate
Maternal mortality ratio (MMR)
Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel
Under-five mortality rate (U5MR)
Neonatal mortality rate
% of new HIV infection per 1000 uninfected population
Incidence of tuberculosis per 100,000 population
Malaria incidence
Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
Percentage of adult population with depression received treatment
Percentage of people with drug used received treatment
Prevalence of alcohol use among among population above 18 years old
Injury and death due to accident
Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15–49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods
Teenage pregnancy 15 -19 years
Percentage of the population covered by social health protection systemsi.e. Health Equity Funds and Social Health Insurance schemes
Government Current expenditure on health as % of GDP)
Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
Prevalence of tobacco use among youth aged 13-15
Ratio of physician/nurse/midwife per 1,000 population

goal.title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

indicators.title: Completion rate Grade 6
Completion rate Grade 9
Proportion of grade 1 student passed through all ECE programs
Percentage ofchildren attended all aspects of ECE
Gross enrolment rate in tertiary education (aged 18-21 years) by sex
Gross enrolment rate in technical-vocational education programmes (15- to 24-year-olds)
Gender parity index in lower secondary education
Gender parity index in upper secondary education
Literacy rate by age group
Proportion of schools with access to basic drinking water
Proportion of schools with access to single-sex basic sanitation facilities
Proportion of schools with access to adapted infrastructure and materials for students with disabilities
Proportion of teachers inpre-primary, primary,  lower secondary and upper secondary education who have received pre-service or in-service training
Percentage of pre school teachers qualified according to national standards
Percentage of primary teachers qualified according to national standards
Percentage of secondary teachers qualified according to national standards
Percentage of teachers who received in-service training

goal.title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

indicators.title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‑discrimination on the basis of sex

Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
. Number of legal and policy measures to address and recognize work-life balance, and unpaid care and domestic works, and promote women's increased access to decent employment
Proportion of seats held by women in legislative organs
Proportion of under secretary of state who are women
Proportion of seats held by women in commune councils
Proportion of women aged 15–49 years who make their own informed decisions regarding sexual relations, contraceptive use and reproductive health care
The number of laws, policies, plans and legal regulations that ensure that all women have access to information , education and sexual and reproductive health services
Number of institutions with a system to track and allocate budget to promote  gender equality and empower women
Number of line Ministries, Line Agencies have development and Implement Gender Mainstreaming Strategic  Plan

goal.title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

indicators.title: Proportion of population using an improved drinking water source
Proportion of population using an improved sanitation facility
Proportion of wastewater safely treated
By 2025, all Cambodian people living in urban areas have access to clean water sustainably with quality and affordable price
Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan

goal.title: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

indicators.title: Household by main source of lighting
Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
Annual energy consumption
Proption of primary energy with GDP

goal.title: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

indicators.title: Annual GDP growth rate at constant prices
Growth rate of online company registration
Growth rate of online trade mark registration
Growth Rate of online issuing the Cerficate of Origin
All kinds of products both goods and services that have been processed or developed and have been included in OVOP Movement
Tourism direct GDP as a proportion of total GDP and in growth rate
Number of employees in tourism industries as a proportion of total employees in all sectors
Aid for Trade Commitments and Disbursements

goal.title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

indicators.title: Freight volumes of ports and railway
Air transport, international passengers carried
Air transport, international freight
Number of Cambodian employees in manufacturing sector as a proportion to total employment within thecountry
Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP
Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure
Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology

goal.title: Reduce inequality within and among countries

indicators.title: Growth rates of household expenditure or income per capita among the bottom 40 per cent of the population and the total population
Proportion of people living below 50 per cent of median income
Civil Servants Retirees and invalid people who receive pension benefits
Number of Trade Related Agreement with other countries
.  Total official development assistance for Cambodia

goal.title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

indicators.title: Amount of urban solid waste regularly collected and with adequate final discharge
Percentage of the deduction plastic bag used
Percentage of the solid wasted will be segregate by technical guidance
Annual average of the parameters of CO, NO2, SO2, TSP, PM2.5 and PM10

goal.title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

indicators.title: Percentage of release reduction of Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) to the environment
Percentage of release reduction of mercury (Hg) to the environment
Effectiveness management of hazardous waste and biological and radioactive waste
National recycling rate, tons of material recycled

goal.title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

indicators.title: Percentage of communes/Sangkats vulnerable to climate change
Percentage of households (farming, animal raising, fish raising, and fishing) and local community forestry members participated workshops and received training on climate change

goal.title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

indicators.title: Percentage of the reduction of the sea pollution by the conservation activities
Key ecosystem function and service of marine and coast area maintained and restore as necessary
Percentage of degraded freshwater flooded forests and mangrove forests (ha) that has been transplanted and protected
Percentage of coverage of marine and inland fisheries conservation areas protected
Value of sustainable fisheries production as a percentage of GDP
Percentage of marine resources  which  small-scale fisheries farmers harvested and sold in a stable marke

goal.title: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

indicators.title: Proportion of land areas covered by forest
Percentage of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
Forest areas and ecosystems sustainably utilized
Percentage of sustainable forest protection and management
Area of forest landscape restoration for areas affected by desertification, drought and floods
Number of action plans forconservation of rare and endangered species of fauna and flora developed and implemented
Number of cases of illegal poaching and trafficking of flora and fauna decreased
Number of policies, strategies and regulations on ecosystem services is established and implemented
Official development assistance for conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems

goal.title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

indicators.title: Proportion of people involved in disseminating laws
Proportion of female in civil servant

goal.title: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

indicators.title: Official development assistance as % of GDP
Percentage of population connect to Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions, by speed
Internet users
Total financial and technical assistance (including through North-South, South-South and triangular cooperation) committed to Cambodia
Amount of ODA to Economic and Development Policy/Planning (as % of GDP)​​​ committed to Cambodia
The number of commercial legal norms and standards set up to facilitate local investors and investors in trading
Amount of ODA disbursed to civil society partnerships (as % of GDP)
Proportion of budget expenditure for implementation the National Strategy for the Development of Statistic (NSDS)
Total cumulated areas cleared of mines/ERW
Number of civilian casualties from mines/ERW
The number of villages contaminated by mines / ERW to receive Mine Risk Educationmessages
The number of mine and ERW casualties received rights promotion
The number of mine and ERW casualties received rehabilitation service
The number of mine and ERW casualties received emergency  and rapid response from CMAA
